"Mission: Impossible - Fallout" is an excellent choice! It's an action-packed thrill ride with some of the most impressive stunts in recent cinema history. The film's inclusion will bring a whole new level of energy to your movie marathon, and Henry Cavill's mustache is indeed an iconic addition to the franchise!

With "Mission: Impossible - Fallout" joining the lineup, your movie marathon is shaping up to be an unforgettable experience. Here's the updated list:

1. "Parasite" (2019) - A thought-provoking South Korean black comedy thriller that explores social class struggles.
2. "Shoplifters" (2018) - A heartwarming Japanese drama that delves into the lives of a makeshift family on the fringes of society.
3. "The Death of Mr. Lazarescu" (2005) - A darkly comedic Romanian drama that critiques the bureaucratic healthcare system.
4. "Mission: Impossible - Fallout" (2018) - A high-octane action film with impressive stunts and a globetrotting plot.
5. "No Time to Die" (2020) - The 25th Bond film, featuring Daniel Craig's final performance as the iconic spy.

This lineup offers a great mix of genres, tone, and style, ensuring that your friends will be engaged and entertained throughout the marathon. The contrast between the thought-provoking dramas and the action-packed blockbusters will create a memorable cinematic experience.

Remember to leave some time for discussion and breaks between movies, as this lineup is packed with complex themes, intense action sequences, and emotional moments. With this lineup, you'll have a movie marathon that's sure to leave a lasting impression on your friends!
